sentences.en: And his Word, Scripture, is relevant to all meaning in the universe.
sentences.cn: 祂的话─《圣经》-和宇宙中所有的意义都会有关连.

sentences.en: Become truly competent to teach God's Word and to counsel from Scripture.
sentences.cn: 成为一位真正能从上帝的话劝戒人的工人!请参考下列查询资料.

sentences.en: Does Scripture have other prayer instructions besides The Lord's Prayer?
sentences.cn: 圣经除了主祷文外,是否还有其它关于祷告的教导?

sentences.en: For the scripture saith, Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed.
sentences.cn: 11经上说, 凡信他的人,必不至于羞愧.

sentences.en: K Knowing the Scripture is one thing; knowing the Author is another.
sentences.cn: [认识圣经是一回事, 认识圣经背后的作者又是另一回事.

sentences.en: KKnowing the Scripture is one thing; knowing the Author is another.
sentences.cn: 认识圣经是一回事, 认识圣经背后的作者又是另一回事.

sentences.en: Property companies: foreign monk good recite and chant scripture?
sentences.cn: 物业公司: 外来的和尚好念经?

sentences.en: The devil can cite Scripture for his purpose.
sentences.cn: 为了达到目的,魔鬼也会援引圣经.

sentences.en: The scripture states that God did not want us to be alone.
sentences.cn: 圣经指出上帝并不是想让我们独身一人生活.

sentences.en: the way God is portrayed in Scripture
They believe that the books of scripture were written under divine guidance.
sentences.cn: 他们认为那些经典手稿是在神的指引下写成的.

sentences.en: This scripture was written in Sanskrit and is very hard to understand.
sentences.cn: 这本经籍是用梵文写的,很难读懂.

sentences.en: Tom isn't a bad hand , now , at explaining Scripture, I'll dare swear.
sentences.cn: 我敢担保, 汤姆讲解《圣经》还一定讲得不错呢.

sentences.en: Truly there is, both in the Scripture and the statute - book.
sentences.cn: 明明有嘛, 圣经里和法典上全都写着呢.

sentences.en: We should soon have another version of the scripture doctrine.
sentences.cn: 我们马上就会听到关于《圣经》教训的另一种解释.

sentences.en: Yes, this theory is found in a recorded scripture.
sentences.cn: 不错, 这是理论发现,在记录的经典之作.
